job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>A Little About This Gig:</strong></p><p>You would be working with a forward-thinking team merging innovation and technology. In this role, you will:</p><ul><li>Strike a balance between critical thinking and actual hands-on analyses</li><li>Stitch and calibrate sparse and noisy data across various data sources</li><li>Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data</li><li>Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns</li><li>Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms</li><li>Present information using data visualization techniques</li><li>Apply statistics techniques to improve our experimentation platform and process</li><li>Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges</li><li>Collaborate with engineering and product development teams</li><li>Deliver on timeline commitments where necessary</li><li>Build trust and strong relationships at all levels</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>The Perfect Candidate:</strong></p><ul><li>The ideal candidate will be intricately involved in running analytical experiments in a methodical manner and will regularly evaluate alternate models via theoretical approaches</li><li>5+ years of experience is REQUIRED</li><li>Prior data science experience (preferably in an engineering or technology role)</li><li>Strong Quantitative background- Masters expected, PhD preferred</li><li>Familiarity with common analysis tools; SQL and Jupyter are preferred</li><li>Programming chops- demonstrable familiarity (work experience, Github account) with programming concepts. Python skills a plus</li><li>Research mindset- ability to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementation</li><li><u>*</u><strong><u>Please link your Kaggle/Github in your application*</u></strong></li></ul>
